TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ServerDocument extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 提供对文档或工作簿（属于使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的文档级自定义项）中的缓存数据和自定义项信息的访问。

span.span: Provides access to the cached data and customization information in a document or workbook that is part of a document-level customization created by using the Office development tools in Visual Studio.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类来管理未安装 Excel 的计算机上的文档级自定义项的某些方面或安装 Word。Use the class to manage certain aspects of document-level customizations on a computer that does not have Excel or Word installed. 通常情况下，在集成的应用程序不与 Office，如控制台项目或 Windows 窗体项目，而不是 Office 项目中需要使用此类。You typically use this class in applications that do not integrate with Office, such as Console projects or Windows Forms projects, rather than Office projects. 使用的以下成员类来执行常见任务：Use the following members of the class to perform common tasks: - 若要访问和修改数据的服务器上的文档数据缓存中，使用属性。To access and modify data in the data cache of a document on a server, use the property. - 若要以编程方式将自定义项附加到文档或从文档中删除自定义项，使用和方法。To programmatically attach a customization to a document or remove a customization from a document, use the and methods. - 若要访问或更改的部署清单的与文档相关联的 URL，请使用属性。To access or change the URL of the deployment manifest that is associated with the document, use the property. 有两个不同版本Visual Studio 2010 Tools for Office Runtime 中的类。There are two different versions of the class in the Visual Studio 2010 Tools for Office Runtime. 你应使用的版本取决于目标的应用程序的.NET Framework 中想要使用的类：The version you should use depends on the target .NET Framework of the application in which you want to use the class: - 为目标的应用程序[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，使用Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll 程序集中的类。For applications that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], use the class in the Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll assembly. - 对于面向.NET Framework 3.5 的应用程序，使用`Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument`Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.v10.0.dll 程序集中的类。For applications that target the .NET Framework 3.5, use the `Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument` class in the Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.v10.0.dll assembly. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过在服务器上使用 ServerDocument 类管理文档](/visualstudio/vsto/managing-documents-on-a-server-by-using-the-serverdocument-class.md)。For more information, see [Managing Documents on a Server by Using the ServerDocument Class](/visualstudio/vsto/managing-documents-on-a-server-by-using-the-serverdocument-class.md). ## 选择使用哪个构造函数Choosing Which Constructor to Use 若要使用类来访问缓存的数据或部署清单 URL 在文档中，则必须创建对象。To use the class to access the cached data or the deployment manifest URL in a document, you must create a object. 有两组构造函数：There are two sets of constructors: - 一组可以用来访问已在内存中打开的文档。A set that you can use to access a document that has already been opened in memory. - 一组可以用来访问磁盘上的文档。A set that you can use to access a document that is on disk. ### 访问内存中的文档Accessing a Document in Memory 若要访问已在内存中打开的文档，请使用以下构造函数之一：To access a document that has already been opened in memory, use one of the following constructors: - - 这些构造函数接受字节数组或表示内存中的文档。These constructors accept a byte array or a that represents the document in memory. 这是很有用，如果你想要修改的缓存的数据或应用程序清单中之前流的形式传送到目标通过使用 HTTP 协议文档。This is useful if you want to modify the cached data or application manifest in the document before streaming it to a destination by using the HTTP protocol. 若要使用这些构造函数，该文档必须已经自定义项;否则，这些构造函数会引发异常。To use these constructors, the document must already have a customization; otherwise, these constructors will throw a exception. ### 访问磁盘上的文档Accessing a Document on Disk 若要访问磁盘上的文档，请使用以下构造函数之一：To access a document that is on disk, use one of the following constructors: - - 这些构造函数接受你想要打开的文档的完整路径。These constructors accept the full path of the document that you want to open. 默认情况下，打开该文档时具有读/写访问权限。By default, the document is opened with read/write access. 如果你想要以只读或只写访问权限打开文档，使用构造函数具有参数。If you want to open the document with read-only or write-only access, use the constructor that has a parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新，加载指定的文档，然后显示的部署清单的附加到文档的自定义项的 URL。The following code example creates a new that loads a specified document and then displays the URL of the deployment manifest for the customization that is attached to the document. 此示例需要：This example requires: - 控制台应用程序项目或某些其他非 Office 项目。A console application project or some other non-Office project. - 对以下程序集的引用：References to the following assemblies: - Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll 和 Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dll (如果项目面向 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)])。Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll and Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dll (if the project targets the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]). 或or - Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.v10.0.dll 和 Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.v9.0.dll （如果项目面向.NET Framework 3.5）。Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.v10.0.dll and Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.v9.0.dll (if the project targets the .NET Framework 3.5). - summary.span: 使用指定的程序集名称和部署清单，将自定义项附加到指定文档。

span.span: Attaches a customization to the specified document by using the specified assembly name and deployment manifest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将指定的自定义与文档关联通过添加`_AssemblyName`和`_AssemblyLocation`到文档的自定义文档属性。The method associates the specified customization with the document by adding the `_AssemblyName` and `_AssemblyLocation` custom document properties to the document. 这些属性标识该文档具有自定义项，并指定部署清单的位置。These properties identify that the document has a customization and specify the location of the deployment manifest. 调用此方法成功，的下次用户打开指定的文档后运行时将尝试安装 Office 解决方案。After this method is successfully called, the next time a user opens the specified document, the runtime will attempt to install the Office solution. 有关自定义文档属性的详细信息，请参阅[自定义文档属性概述](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-document-properties-overview.md)。For more information about the custom document properties, see [Custom Document Properties Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-document-properties-overview.md). 如果指定的文档不包含自定义项要求文档，一个控件方法将成功，但程序集加载在用户打开文档时将失败。If the specified document does not contain a control that the customization expects the document to have, the method will succeed, but the assembly will fail to load when the user opens the document. `fileType`参数必须指定具有程序对于文档级自定义支持的文件扩展名的文档。The `fileType` parameter must specify a document that has a file name extension that is supported for document-level customizations. 无法将自定义项附加到 Word XML 文档中保存的文档 (* xml) 或 Word 2003 XML 文档 (\*xml) 文件格式。You cannot attach a customization to a document that is saved in the Word XML Document (*xml) or Word 2003 XML Document (\*xml) file formats. 有关支持的文件类型的详细信息，请参阅[体系结构的文档级自定义](/visualstudio/vsto/architecture-of-document-level-customizations.md)。For more information about the supported file types, see [Architecture of Document-Level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/architecture-of-document-level-customizations.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法将自定义项附加到指定的文档。The following code example uses the method to attach a customization to the specified document. 此示例需要：This example requires: - 控制台应用程序项目或某些其他非 Office 项目。A console application project or some other non-Office project. - 对以下程序集的引用：References to the following assemblies: - Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll 和 Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dll (如果项目面向 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)])。Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll and Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dll (if the project targets the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]). 或or - Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.v10.0.dll 和 Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.v9.0.dll （如果项目面向.NET Framework 3.5）。Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.v10.0.dll and Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.v9.0.dll (if the project targets the .NET Framework 3.5). - `Imports` （对于 Visual Basic) 或`using`（对于 C#) 语句和代码文件顶部的命名空间。`Imports` (for Visual Basic) or `using` (for C#) statements for and namespaces at the top of your code file. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将指定的自定义与文档关联通过添加`_AssemblyName`和`_AssemblyLocation`到文档的自定义文档属性。The method associates the specified customization with the document by adding the `_AssemblyName` and `_AssemblyLocation` custom document properties to the document. 这些属性标识该文档具有自定义项，并指定部署清单的位置。These properties identify that the document has a customization and specify the location of the deployment manifest. 调用此方法成功，的下次用户打开指定的文档之后, 运行时将尝试安装 Office 解决方案。After this method is successfully called, the next time a user opens the specified document, the runtime attempts to install the Office solution. 有关自定义文档属性的详细信息，请参阅[自定义文档属性概述](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-document-properties-overview.md)。For more information about the custom document properties, see [Custom Document Properties Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-document-properties-overview.md). 传递给 GUID`solutionID`的附加到文档的解决方案的应用程序清单中指定参数。The GUID that you pass to the `solutionID` parameter is specified in the application manifest of the solution that you are attaching to the document. 你必须传递中指定的相同 GUID`solutionId`属性`vstov4:document`应用程序清单中的元素。You must pass the same GUID that is specified in the `solutionId` attribute of the `vstov4:document` element in the application manifest. 有关详细信息，请参阅[应用程序和部署清单在 Office 解决方案中](/visualstudio/vsto/application-and-deployment-manifests-in-office-solutions.md)和[ \< 文档\>元素](/visualstudio/vsto/document-element-office-development-in-visual-studio.md)。For more information, see [Application and Deployment Manifests in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/application-and-deployment-manifests-in-office-solutions.md) and [\<document\> Element](/visualstudio/vsto/document-element-office-development-in-visual-studio.md). 如果你将连接从发布位置的自定义项，请确保你指定中的程序集的正确的文件名称`assemblyName`参数。If you are attaching a customization from a publish location, make sure that you specify the correct file name for the assembly in the `assemblyName` parameter. 当发布 Office 解决方案时，复制到发布文件夹的程序集具有.deploy 文件扩展名。When you publish an Office solution, the assembly that is copied to the publish folder has the .deploy file name extension. 例如，如果程序集名称，WordDocument1.dll 发布文件夹中的程序集的文件名称将是 WordDocument1.dll.deploy。For example, if the assembly name is WordDocument1.dll, the file name of the assembly in the publish folder is WordDocument1.dll.deploy. 有关详细信息，请参阅[部署 Office 解决方案使用 clickonce](/visualstudio/vsto/deploying-an-office-solution-by-using-clickonce.md)。For more information, see [Deploying an Office Solution by Using ClickOnce](/visualstudio/vsto/deploying-an-office-solution-by-using-clickonce.md). 如果指定的文档不包含自定义项要求文档，一个控件方法将成功，但程序集加载在用户打开文档时将失败。If the specified document does not contain a control that the customization expects the document to have, the method will succeed, but the assembly will fail to load when the user opens the document. `fileType`参数必须指定具有用于 Microsoft Office Word 和 Microsoft Office Excel 文档级自定义支持的文件扩展名的文档。The `fileType` parameter must specify a document that has a file name extension that is supported for document-level customizations for Microsoft Office Word and Microsoft Office Excel. 无法将自定义项附加到 Word XML 文档中保存的文档 (* xml) 或 Word 2003 XML 文档 (\*xml) 文件格式。You cannot attach a customization to a document that is saved in the Word XML Document (*xml) or Word 2003 XML Document (\*xml) file formats. 有关支持的文件类型的详细信息，请参阅[体系结构的文档级自定义](/visualstudio/vsto/architecture-of-document-level-customizations.md)。For more information about the supported file types, see [Architecture of Document-Level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/architecture-of-document-level-customizations.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法将自定义项附加到指定的文档。The following code example uses the method to remarks.format: ## Remarks 在文档中缓存的数据存储在对象的层次结构。The cached data in a document is stored in a hierarchy of objects. 该层次结构中的第一个对象是此属性返回的对象。The object returned by this property is the first object in that hierarchy. 有关详细信息，请参阅[访问的服务器上的文档数据](/visualstudio/vsto/accessing-data-in-documents-on-the-server.md)。For more information, see [Accessing Data in Documents on the Server](/visualstudio/vsto/accessing-data-in-documents-on-the-server.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新，然后使用属性在数据缓存中显示对象的名称。The following code example creates a new , and then uses the property to display the names of the objects in the data cache. 此示例需要：This example requires: - 控制台应用程序项目或某些其他非 Office 项目。A console application project or some other non-Office project. - 对以下程序集的引用：References to the following assemblies: - Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll 和 Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dll (如果项目面向 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)])。Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll and Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dll (if the project targets the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]). 或or - Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.v10.0.dll 和 Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.v9.0.dll （如果项目面向.NET Framework 3.5）。Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.v10.0.dll and Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.v9.0.dll (if the project targets the .NET Framework 3.5). - `Imports` （对于 Visual Basic) 或`using`（对于 C#) 语句和代码文件顶部的命名空间。`Imports` (for Visual Basic) or `using` (for C#) statements for and namespaces at the top of your code file. summary.span: 获取或设置与文档关联的自定义项的部署清单 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of the deployment manifest for the customization that is associated with the document.

value.span: 一个 URL，指定与文档关联的自定义项的部署清单的名称和位置。

span.span: A URL that specifies the name and location of the deployment manifest for the customization that is associated with the document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将的部署清单的自定义项移动到另一个位置，并且你想要查找从新位置的自定义更新的文档，请将此属性设置为新的 URL。Set this property to a new URL if you move the deployment manifest for a customization to a different location, and you want the document to locate customization updates from the new location. 如果设置此属性，该 URL 必须指向已与文档相关联的自定义部署清单。If you set this property, the URL must point to a deployment manifest for the customization that is already associated with the document. 此属性不能用于将新的自定义与文档相关联。You cannot use this property to associate a new customization with a document. 若要将自定义项添加到自定义的文档，使用方法。To add a customization to an uncustomized document, use the method. 若要将不同的自定义项添加到自定义文档中，先使用方法来删除当前自定义项，然后使用方法。To add a different customization to a customized document, first use the method to remove the current customization, and then use the method. ## 在面向.NET Framework 3.5 的应用程序中获取 URLGetting the URL in Applications that Target the .NET Framework 3.5 当你使用`ServerDocument`在面向.NET Framework 3.5 的应用程序中的 Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.v10.0.dll 程序集的类属性返回当前部署清单的 URL 仅如果在其中运行该应用程序的计算机上安装了文档级自定义项。When you use the `ServerDocument` class in the Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.v10.0.dll assembly in an application that targets the .NET Framework 3.5, the property returns the current deployment manifest URL only if the documentation-level customization is installed on the computer where you are running the application. 对于其他类型的单元格，此属性返回 `null`。Otherwise, this property returns `null`. 如果你需要获取其中你运行应用程序 （例如，在其中发布的文档级自定义项的服务器） 的计算机未安装的文档级自定义项的部署清单 URL，请在.NET Framework 4 为目标应用程序中，引用 Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll 程序集，并使用`ServerDocument`该程序集中的类。If you need to get the deployment manifest URL of a document-level customization that is not installed on the computer where you are running the application (for example, on a server where a document-level customization is published), target the .NET Framework 4 in the application, reference the Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll assembly, and use the `ServerDocument` class in that assembly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用构造函数来创建一个新加载指定的文档。The following code example uses the constructor to create a new that loads a specified document. 然后，此示例显示的部署清单的附加到文档的自定义项的 URL。The example then displays the URL of the deployment manifest for the customization that is attached to the document. 此示例需要：This example requires: - 控制台应用程序项目或某些其他非 Office 项目。A console application project or some other non-Office project. - 对以下程序集的引用：References to the following assemblies: - Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll 和 Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dll (如果项目面向 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)])。Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll and Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dll (if the project targets the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]). 或or - Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.v10.0.dll 和 Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.v9.0.dll （如果项目面向.NET Framework 3.5）。Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.v10.0.dll and Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.v9.0.dll (if the project targets the .NET Framework 3.5). - `Imports` （对于 Visual Basic) 或`using`（对于 C#) 语句和代码文件顶部的命名空间。`Imports` (for Visual Basic) or `using` (for C#) statements for and namespaces at the top of your code file. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在不同版本的 Visual Studio 中创建的 office 解决方案使用不同版本的[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]。Office solutions created in different versions of Visual Studio use different versions of the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]. 每个版本的运行时提供的不同版本`ServerDocument`用于处理该版本的运行时的解决方案的类。Each version of the runtime provides a different version of the `ServerDocument` class that is designed to work with solutions for that version of the runtime. 此版本的类可以用于通过创建的解决方案[!INCLUDE[vs_dev12](~/includes/vs-dev12-md.md)]，[!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)]和使用 2007 Microsoft Office 解决方案中，使用 Visual Studio 2008 创建的。This version of the class can be used with solutions that are created by using [!INCLUDE[vs_dev12](~/includes/vs-dev12-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] and with 2007 Microsoft Office solutions that are created by using Visual Studio 2008. 下表指定此方法的返回值的含义。The following table specifies the meaning of the return values for this method. |返回值Return value|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| |00|文档不具有自定义项。The document does not have a customization.| |11|文档具有使用 Visual Studio Tools for Office 2003 版创建的自定义项。The document has a customization that was created by using Visual Studio Tools for Office, Version 2003.| |22|文档具有已通过使用 Visual Studio 2005 Tools for Office Second Edition runtime 的自定义项。The document has a customization that was created by using the Visual Studio 2005 Tools for Office Second Edition runtime. 这是用于通过自定义操作在 Visual Studio 2005 Tools 中的 Microsoft Office 2003 Office 和 Visual Studio 2008 的运行时版本。This is the version of the runtime that is used by customizations for Microsoft Office 2003 in Visual Studio 2005 Tools for Office and Visual Studio 2008.| |33|该文档具有的自定义项已通过使用 Visual Studio 2010 Tools Office 运行时或 Visual Studio Tools for Microsoft Office system (3.0 版运行时)。The document has a customization that was created by using the Visual Studio 2010 Tools for Office Runtime or the Visual Studio Tools for the Microsoft Office system (version 3.0 Runtime). 自定义 2007 Microsoft Office 系统在 Visual Studio 2008 使用的运行时版本 3.0。Version 3.0 of the runtime is used by customizations for the 2007 Microsoft Office system in Visual Studio 2008.| 有关不同版本的详细信息[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]，请参阅[Visual Studio Tools for Office Runtime 概述](/visualstudio/vsto/visual-studio-tools-for-office-runtime-overview.md)。For more information about the different versions of the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)], see [Visual Studio Tools for Office Runtime Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/visual-studio-tools-for-office-runtime-overview.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新，加载指定的文档，然后显示的部署清单的附加到文档的自定义项的 URL。The following code example creates a new that loads a specified document and then displays the URL of the deployment manifest for the customization that is attached to the document. 在创建对象之前, 的代码使用方法以验证是否通过使用 Visual Studio 2010 Tools for Office 运行时创建自定义项。Before creating the object, the code uses the method to verify that the customization was created by using the Visual Studio 2010 Tools for Office Runtime. 此示例需要：This
